maize.notes: Store maize in cool, dry conditions to prevent mold and insect damage.

potatoes.notes: Potatoes need cold storage with high humidity to prevent sprouting and shrinkage.

rice.notes: Rice should be stored in cool, moderately humid conditions to prevent pest infestation.

cassava.notes: Fresh cassava roots deteriorate quickly. Store at low temperatures with high humidity.

beans.notes: Dry beans should be kept in cool, dry storage to prevent mold and insect damage.

onions.notes: Onions need cold, low-humidity storage to prevent sprouting and decay.
